term.title: chirotopic

item.text: The description of an atom (or point, group, face, etc. in a molecular model) that resides within a chiral environment. One that resides within an achiral environment has been called achirotopic.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2193. 'Basic terminology of stereochemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2203 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122193)
